name: shadowDict
summary: Dictionary describing the shadow effect for text.

properties.name: blurRadius
properties.summary: Specifies the blur radius of the shadow.
properties.description: A value of 0 means no blur is applied.

properties.name: color
properties.summary: Color name or hex triplet specifying the color of the shadow.

properties.name: offset
properties.summary: Size with the properties width and height used as the horizontal and vertical offset of the shadow, respectively.
